abstract: Since all 50 states signed on to a investigation of big mortgage lenders, a public tug of war has ensued.
snippet: Since all 50 states signed on to a investigation of big mortgage lenders, a public tug of war has ensued.
lead_paragraph: Changing the face of foreclosure in America will take some time, several state attorneys general said Wednesday, cautioning that an agreement with major lenders over revamped foreclosure practices was not imminent.

headline.main: Foreclosure Fix Is Seen as Distant
headline.print_headline: Foreclosure Fix Is Seen As Distant

byline.original: By David Streitfeld and Nelson D. Schwartz
